message.content:
Here is a healthy meal plan for you that avoids dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews. The meals are balanced with lean proteins, whole grains, fruits, and vegetables to ensure a nutritious week.

Monday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free oatmeal with mixed berries, chia seeds, and unsweetened almond milk
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and olive oil dressing
Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and steamed broccoli
Snack: Baby carrots and hummus

Tuesday:
Breakfast: Green smoothie with spinach, banana, frozen mango, and coconut water
Lunch: Turkey and avocado lettuce wraps with a side of cucumber slices
Dinner: Lentil soup with a mixed green salad and gluten-free bread
Snack: Rice cakes with sunflower seed butter and sliced strawberries

Wednesday:
Breakfast: Chia pudding made with coconut milk, topped with sliced kiwi and shredded coconut
Lunch: Quinoa and black bean salad with red bell pepper, corn, and cilantro, dressed with lime juice and olive oil
Dinner: Grilled shrimp with a side of roasted sweet potatoes and green beans
Snack: Sliced apple with sunflower seed butter

Thursday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free toast with avocado and cherry tomatoes, served with a side of mixed berries
Lunch: Tuna salad stuffed in bell peppers, served with baby carrots and celery sticks
Dinner: Baked chicken with a side of brown rice and steamed asparagus
Snack: Mixed nuts (excluding almonds, pistachios, and cashews) and dried fruit

Friday:
Breakfast: Overnight oats made with coconut milk, topped with sliced banana and pumpkin seeds
Lunch: Spinach and feta-stuffed portobello mushrooms with a side of mixed greens and cherry tomatoes
Dinner: Turkey meatballs served over spaghetti squash with marinara sauce and a side of steamed zucchini
Snack: Fresh fruit salad

Saturday:
Breakfast: Green smoothie with spinach, frozen mango, banana, and coconut water
Lunch: Grilled vegetable quinoa bowl with cherry tomatoes, red bell pepper, zucchini, and olive oil dressing
Dinner: Baked cod with a side of roasted sweet potatoes and green beans
Snack: Rice cakes with sunflower seed butter and sliced strawberries

Sunday:
Breakfast: Gluten-free oatmeal with mixed berries, chia seeds, and unsweetened almond milk
Lunch: Turkey and avocado lettuce wraps with a side of cucumber slices
Dinner: Lentil soup with a mixed green salad and gluten-free bread
Snack: Baby carrots and hummus

Remember to adjust portion sizes according to your individual needs and preferences. Enjoy your healthy week!
